title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 810.8 - Assignment of ground water classifications and standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 810.8 - Assignment of ground water classifications and standards

State Regulations

The ground water classifications and standards adopted by
the Water Resources Commission on March 9, 1967 and duly filed as Part 703 of

Title 6 NYCRR entitled "Ground Water Classifications and Standards" with the

Secretary of State on March 20, 1967 are assigned to the ground waters of

Newtown Creek drainage basin in the Counties of Chemung and

Schuyler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
810.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
